text:
it says "Couldn't find a JDK on this system. Please install one at sun.com." or
something, but i have one, and it's in my CLASSPATH...
creator: keith@cs.oswego.edu
remm@apache.org
text:
The installer isn't very intelligent regarding to JDK detection. It think it 
also only works with Sun's JDK.
We may have a more powerfull installer in the future, but obviously it will 
require a lot more efforts to develop than this one.
